titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the RISM Audiovisual Collection RISM.RG.18
titlestmt.author: Emilyn L. Brown (finding aid) and John Bence (inventory).

editionstmt.p: This version was derived from AV Box List

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-03-10 09:33:40 -0500.

did.unittitle: Audiovisual Collection of the Research Institute for the Study of Man

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Research Institute for the Study of Man

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: Research Institute for the Study of Man

did.abstract: These tapes are not obviously part of any other RISM collections. They include 1/4" audio as well as cassette tapes. There are commercially produced music tapes in the collection as well.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: These materials were transferred from the Research Institute for the Study of Man.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Some of the materials in this collection may be restricted. Please contact the University Archives with questions.
Additionally, please note that this collection is stored offsite, and you must contact the repository to schedule access.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
New York University Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2646
Fax: (212) 995-4225
E-mail: university-archives@nyu.edu

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: The following tapes have been appended to specific collections:

list.head: The Vera D. Rubin Papers, 1955 - 1985 (RG1)
list.item:
"Jamaican Pot Study/Dr. Rubin"
Producer: Mark Schorr WSRF/WSHE-FM
Nov 1973

Dr. Vera Rubin
Cannabis Congress Report Chicago
undated

Ganja in Jamaica by Vera Rubin w/comments by Cora Weiss (7.5")
Sep 1975

Michael Manley @ Seton Hall
undated

Papers The Untold Story -- Chronicle in the words of Maurice Bishop, with added commentary by Charles Shultz, Ron Dellums and others. Edited and produced by Felipe Sigidi Braudy with Estrella Mar, Inter-American Communications Foundation.
Dec 1984

Ganja -- A discussion with Jon Lomberg, Toronto, Canada,
Jul 11, 1980

CBC Marijuana: Commissions and Culture
John Chappel, Vera Rubin, Louis Bozzetti, Mel Green
undated

list.head: Sula Benet Papers (RG2)
list.item: Aging from Birth to Death: Biosocial Perspectives. Recorded presentations by the following speakers: Gerald E. McClearn, James F. Fries, J. Allan Herd, Richard Suzman, Judith Rodin

May 1962

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: On case: "Calypso in T'dad; 6/7/57; Last cut at 7 1/2 IPS; Trinidad Salutes Assignment; Vocal by March of Dimes"

did.unittitle: "Sparrow Power" recorded in Port of Spain, Trinidad - 7" Reel

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: On Case: "Side A (Sparrow = Slinger Francisco); Recorded in Post of Spain, Tr." Track List: 1) Panman, 2) Grampa's Advice, 3) Sweeter Than You, 4) Learn to Cook, 5) Shake Your Waist, 6) Sell the Pussy, 7) Wilhemena, 8) Saturday Night, 9) Chinese Love Affair, 10) Dutch Romance"

did.unittitle: King Eric and His Knights at the Big Bamboo in Bay Street, Nassau/Bahamas - 7" Reel

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: On case: "Side A: King Eric and His Knights at the Big Bamboo-1) Limbo Rock, 2) Watermelon on the Vine, 3) Dinasoar, 4) Nassau Market, 5) These are the Times, 6) Fools Rush In, 7) Big Bamboo Bama, 8) Mambo Jambo, 9) Do You Love Me, 10) Uncue You, 11) I Adore Her, 12) Big Bamboo; The Treasure Cove (Rising Sun) Steel Band-Solid Steel- 1) 67, 2) Guantanamera, 3) Watermelon Man, 4) Poor Old Joe, 5) Fire in Your Wire; Side B: Solid Steel Cont.- 1) Governor's Ball (written by Sparrow), 2) Blue Danube, 3) No Money No Love, 4) Sound of Music, 5) Pany Boy, 6) Sandra (written by Sparrow); "Beauty and the Brute Force"- 1) J.B. Williams Road March, 2) Cha Cha Mambo, 3) Woman in Love, 4) Fire Down Below, 5) Zambezi, 6) Breakfast in Bed (Calypso), 7) Calypso Blues, 8) Balisier, 9) Que Sera, Sera, 10) Jamaica Farewell, 11) Banna Song, 12) Autumn Leaves"
